data.lyric:
[ti:Change Your Life (Explicit)]
[ar:Kehlani/Jhené Aiko]
[al:It Was Good Until It Wasn't (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Change Your Life (Explicit) - Kehlani (柯兰尼)/Jhené Aiko
[00:00.52]Lyrics by：Kehlani Parrish/Andrew Wansel/Warren Felder/Alex Niceforo/Keith Sorrells/Jhené Aiko
[00:01.05]I heard you was a gang gang gangsta
[00:04.21]Not one try to save save save her
[00:07.39]Always focused on your paper
[00:10.18]Don't go to time to wager with
[00:12.28]Your heart
[00:13.88]I'm trying to switch up your cadence
[00:17.25]Book flights and vacations
[00:20.42]Tequila and relations
[00:23.25]Kissing on new places
[00:25.77]Baby let me change your life
[00:28.57]You wanna see that you can be anything you want
[00:32.21]Baby let me change your life
[00:34.90]You oughta be
[00:36.54]You oughta be anything
[00:38.79]Baby I can make you right
[00:41.43]You wanna see that you can be anything that you want
[00:45.37]Baby let me change your life
[00:47.89]You wanna be
[00:49.57]You wanna be anything
[00:51.36]You could be anything
[00:52.87]Everything
[00:53.84]I'm not saying that you incomplete but
[00:57.20]Just imagine what we be if we became one
[01:01.92]You deserve someone that will take you to another level
[01:05.32]Let me put you on
[01:08.55]You got so much potential
[01:09.96]I really am f**king with you
[01:11.97]Just open your heart
[01:15.17]I'm tryna get you right
[01:16.49]Take you to the other side
[01:17.99]Baby let me change your life
[01:20.72]You wanna see that you can be anything you want
[01:24.55]Baby let me change your life
[01:27.22]You oughta be
[01:28.84]You oughta be anything
[01:31.10]Baby I can make you right
[01:33.68]You wanna see that you can be anything that you want
[01:37.72]Baby let me change your life
[01:40.24]You wanna be
[01:41.74]You wanna be anything
[01:43.72]You could be anything
[01:45.36]Everything
[01:46.78]Wanna be a lover
[01:47.84]I can teach you love ya
[01:49.96]Wanna be a hubby
[01:51.07]You can wife me up
[01:53.30]Wanna be a chef
[01:54.25]Go and spice it up
[01:55.87]Be a boxer beat it up
[01:57.38]Don't ever need no gloves
[01:59.71]Wanna retire
[02:00.83]Different b***hes your lifestyle
[02:02.70]Use to be Models
[02:04.12]Ig honeys all shaped like bottles
[02:06.00]But now you seeing
[02:07.05]Now its more than body face and smile
[02:09.38]You see me and you look beyond it
[02:11.22]You feel inspired
[02:12.90]I'm here to excel with you
[02:14.82]Here to break bread with you
[02:16.46]Here to travel the world and sleep in different beds with you
[02:19.58]Here to make revenue
[02:21.20]Know its impressing you
[02:23.49]Baby let me change your life
[02:25.99]You wanna see that you can be anything you want
[02:29.86]Baby let me change your life
[02:32.46]You oughta be
[02:34.02]You oughta be anything
[02:36.37]Baby I can make you right
[02:39.04]You wanna see that you can be anything that you want
[02:42.98]Baby let me change your life
[02:45.55]You wanna be
[02:47.10]You wanna be anything
[02:49.30]You could be anything
[02:50.68]Everything
data.trans:
[ti:Change Your Life (Explicit)]
[ar:Kehlani/Jhené Aiko]
[al:It Was Good Until It Wasn't (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.52]//
[00:01.05]我听说你是个匪帮分子
[00:04.21]没人试图拯救 拯救 拯救她
[00:07.39]总是在拼命挣钱
[00:10.18]没时间
[00:12.28]谈情说爱
[00:13.88]我要改变你的状态
[00:17.25]订好机票 出去度假
[00:20.42]喝龙舌兰 谈个恋爱
[00:23.25]在不同的地方亲吻
[00:25.77]宝贝 让我改变你的生活
[00:28.57]亲眼看看 你可以成为任何你想成为的人
[00:32.21]宝贝 让我改变你的生活
[00:34.90]你应该
[00:36.54]你该有无限可能
[00:38.79]宝贝 我可以指引你
[00:41.43]亲眼看看 你可以成为任何你想成为的人
[00:45.37]宝贝 让我改变你的生活
[00:47.89]你想
[00:49.57]你想随心所欲
[00:51.36]你可以有无限可能
[00:52.87]无限可能
[00:53.84]我不是说你的人生不完整 但是
[00:57.20]想象一下 如果我们在一起 会是什么样的场景
[01:01.92]你值得拥有一个能够带你走向新世界的人
[01:05.32]让我带你飞翔
[01:08.55]你的潜力无限
[01:09.96]我真的很喜欢你
[01:11.97]敞开心扉吧
[01:15.17]我想要让你快乐起来
[01:16.49]带你去另一个世界
[01:17.99]宝贝 让我改变你的生活
[01:20.72]亲眼看看 你可以成为任何你想成为的人
[01:24.55]宝贝 让我改变你的生活
[01:27.22]你应该
[01:28.84]你该有无限可能
[01:31.10]宝贝 我可以指引你
[01:33.68]亲眼看看 你可以成为任何你想成为的人
[01:37.72]宝贝 让我改变你的生活
[01:40.24]你想
[01:41.74]你想随心所欲
[01:43.72]你可以有无限可能
[01:45.36]无限可能
[01:46.78]听着 想要谈恋爱吗
[01:47.84]我可以教你呀
[01:49.96]想做个丈夫吗
[01:51.07]你可以娶我呀
[01:53.30]想做个厨师吗
[01:54.25]那就行动起来呀
[01:55.87]想做个拳击手吗 那就挥舞拳头
[01:57.38]不需要戴手套
[01:59.71]等退休后
[02:00.83]每天都有不同的女人 生活美滋滋
[02:02.70]还有模特
[02:04.12]网红美女 身材都超级棒
[02:06.00]现在你知道了
[02:07.05]这不只是关乎身材 脸蛋和笑容
[02:09.38]你看我 看到了无限可能
[02:11.22]你感觉深受鼓舞
[02:12.90]我要和你一起超越自我
[02:14.82]和你一起享受生活
[02:16.46]和你一起环游世界 在不同的地方相拥而眠
[02:19.58]和你一起挣钱
[02:21.20]我知道这会给你留下深刻印象
[02:23.49]宝贝 让我改变你的生活
[02:25.99]亲眼看看 你可以成为任何你想成为的人
[02:29.86]宝贝 让我改变你的生活
[02:32.46]你应该
[02:34.02]你该有无限可能
[02:36.37]宝贝 我可以指引你
[02:39.04]亲眼看看 你可以成为任何你想成为的人

[02:45.55]你想
[02:47.10]你想随心所欲
[02:49.30]你可以有无限可能
[02:50.68]无限可能
